original: Hello, how can I help you today?
Can I move up my delivery date to next week on my order? The shipping fee is too high for me right now since my pay's been cut.
Glad to help. May I have your full name please?
Are you still there? Do you need my order number?
so you want to downgrade your shipping?
Account has been pulled up for Sanya Afzal.
Yes. I want there to be no shipping fee, so just standard shipping please.
Can you please let me know your Account ID and Order ID to verify your identity?
Sorry, I know it's a pain, but I'm sure i'm not the only one asking for this kind of thing now. :(
Oh it is too late to change anything now.
I am really sorry about that. I can't do anything for guest members in this situation.
You are welcome. Is there anything else that I can help you with?
I'll just have to remember that for future orders.
No, that was all. Thanks again.
Hello, how can I help you?
Hello. Im looking at the Calvin Klein t-shirt, but $49 is way too much.
I can get the same shirt on Amazon for $29.
Let's see what we can do for you. Can I get your full name or account ID?
Account has been pulled up for Chloe Zhang.
A reason of competitor has been recorded.
Can you also provide your account ID and order ID?
Thank you. Our pricing algorithm is highly sophisticated and takes several things into account, such as stock, season, among other things that will ultimately determine the price
Well I'll buy from someone else if I have to, but I prefer to use you.
Since you are such a loyal customer, I will offer you a promo code that will take $20 off the price, but it expires in 24 hours
A promo code has been created.
Oh that will be perfect. Thank you so much.
Is there anything else you needed?
Well that's all I needed. Thanks!
Thank you for contacting AcmeBrands! How can I help you today?
i recieved a promo code in my email
it is saying it is invalid
i got it about 5 days ago
I'm sorry to hear that your promo code isn't working. Could I have your name or account ID to pull up your account?
Account has been pulled up for Joyce Wu.
Querying the system for an answer ...
What is your membership level with us, Joyce?
Membership level of silver has been noted.
Great! I can provide you with a new promo code to use on your order. I'm sorry the first one we sent you is invalid.
A promo code has been created.
You can use promo code NDKAC when placing your order.
Is there anything else I can help you with?
Hi there, how can I help you today?
Hello, I would like to double check the total cost of some items I ordered, there seems to be a discrepancy from an email I received.
Of course, I can help with that. What is your name?
Account has been pulled up for Chloe Zhang.
Great, thank you. What is your username?
Thanks. Last, can I please have your account ID and order ID?
Hm, those IDs aren't pulling up for me.
Those are the account ID and the order ID?
Got it, thanks! Just a moment
Querying the system for an answer ...
It looks like the email was not a mistake
What is your membership level, please?
Membership level of Bronze has been noted.
I'm sorry for the issue. As a bronze member, the extra fee stays. The calculated cost by the system is correct.
Is there anything else I can help you with?
No I guess that is all I can do here
Ok again I'm sorry for the issue. Have a great day!
Hi, how can I help you?
For some reason my credit card won't go through when I try to make a purchase.
Can you try re-entering the information?
What is the expiration date on the card?
Still nothing, I've already tried entering it 10 times.
Details of troubleshoot have been entered.
Can you log out of our website and log back in?
Nope. It still won't take my card.
If that does not work I can try to process your order on my end.
I will need your credit card number,
Can you just user what's on file for me?
and the item you wish to purchase
I'm trying to buy a pair of Calvin Klein boots.
A purchase of 123456791234 12/21 Calvin Klein boots was made.
Ok, you will receive a confirmation soon.
If there are any more issues, please contact us again.
Is there anything else I can do for you?
I will. Have a nice day.
Good afternoon and thank you for contacting AcemBrands! How can I help you?
Hi, I didn't get my package
I'm sorry to hear that. Could you give your name and account ID?
Account has been pulled up for 0CHJCPLOS0.
Thank you. And which order ID was this item missing from?
Okay, Sanya, and which item were you missing from your order?
Two of them a Guess Jeans and a Calvin Klein Jeans
I have been waiting for five days
Could I please have your username and email address to confirm the purchase?
A reason of five days has been recorded.
I've confirmed your order and purchase. However, it can take up to 7 days to receive the order. Sometimes it will say delivered but could take a few days to come to your doorstep.
It's likely you will receive the missing items tomorrow or the day after. If you don't receive it in the next few days, please contact us again. Is there anything else I can help you with today.
Thaks for the info. You have a great day.
You're welcome. I hope you enjoy your day, too.
Hi! How can I help you today?
Hello, I would like to know if the Tommy Hilfiger jeans are in dark blue or black?
Sure! Let me look that up for you
FAQ answer related to jeans (other2) was selected.
the jeans you see actually come in a few different colors that include blue, dirt brown, quartz stone and jet black.  We do not have a dark blue so the pair you are looking at is black
Did you have any other questions today?
Ok thank you that answerd my question
You're Welcome! Have a great day

The order ID is 4028365819, date of the order was 08-22-2019

Good news, we can accept the return!
To help me  with the shipping label I will need you street name and number.
Details of 5964 Lincoln ave La Fayette, WA1330 have been entered.
Thank you, I have entered your information.
How would you like to process your return?
Either by mail in store, or at a drop-off location.

You return is ready to go! Is there anything else today?
Thanks and have a good day
Hi, how can I help you?
I want to know my account standing.

Ok, I'll pay it. Thank you.

my husband doesnt want it naymore

thanks Rodriguez. Give me a second.

Then I need your membership level to proceed further, please.

I can offer a refund to you immediately.
After the item arrives, pleas call back to customer support to get the shipping label for return.

A refund has been made to your account.
Is there anything else that I can help you with?
Hello, how can I help you today?
I was looking to buy a Guess Jacket, but the price seems to be much higher than it is anywhere else. I just wanted to check on that.
Happy to help, may I have your name please?
Yes, my name is David Williams
Account has been pulled up for  David Williams.
Did you make the purchase yet?
No, I haven't because the price seemed so high.
I can offer you a discount with a promo code. Does that sound good?
A promo code has been created.
That would be great, thank you.
Great, is there anything else that I can help you with?
No, that was it. Thank you.
How can I help you today?
Can you explain to me the benefits of the premium membership
Sure, I'd be happy to help with that.
First, all members are invited to our annual holiday extravaganza - which has an open bar and free flights from anywhere in the US!
You also save on shipping and get promo codes at the Bronze level
At silver we can make purchases for you and cancel your order at any time, plus all the bronze benefits.
For gold you get unlimited refunds and are always given the benefit of the doubt in transastions.
Was there anything else I could help you with?
that answers my question, thank you
you're welcome, have a good day!
Hello, this is ACME. How may I assist you today?
I need to check on the shipping status of my order. I need to change the delivery time to next week
That's no problem. May I have your full name or Account ID to pull up your account.
Account has been pulled up for Joyce Wu.
Can I also get your Order ID and Account ID?
What is the shipping status of your order?
If it's delivered then I can't change the shipping date. It's possible it will soon arrive today. can refund the shipping fee.
A refund has been made for the amount of $8.
Do you need help with anything else?
Hello, how can I help you today?
I am upset that an item i bought is now cheaper
Okay, let me look into that for you.
Can I have your full name?
Account has been pulled up for Norman Bouchard.
And why are you upset about the price?
Was the item more expensive yesterday?
A reason of yesterday has been recorded.
Can I have your account and order ID's?
Okay, so our prices are set dynamically.
So if somethings price changed then it was because demand went up for the item.
I'm sorry that you missed out on the better deal, but everyone seemed to want it.
I still don't feel this is right. What can you do to help me?
I want to buy it at the price it was previously set at
I can offer you a promo code
If not you have lost my business
How much is the promo code?
It should be enough to cover more than the difference.
A promo code has been created.
thanks for your help I really appreciate it
There you go, that's your code!
Is there anything else I can do for you today?
Thank you for shopping with AcmeBrands! How may I assist you?
I'm having trouble logging into my account.  I can't remember my username.
May I have your full name?
Account has been pulled up for Crystal Minh.
Thank you. May I also have your zip code and phone number?
Is there anything else you need?
Nope.  Let me just make sure that works real quick.
Yep.  That did the trick.  Thanks.
Hi how can I help you
Hi I’m wondering what the benefits of the premium membership are
All members are invited to the annual holiday extravaganza with open bar and free flights from anywhere in the US.
Bronze members save on shipping fees and promo codes.
Silver members get all the previous perks, can have agents make purchases on their behalf and can cancel orders at any time.
Gold members get unlimited refunds and will always be given the benefit of the doubt in transactions.
Awesome thanks for the info. I’ll think about it

The annual sale always starts during the early part of the year. I'm afraid the annual sale for this year started on January 23rd and ended on January 31st.

Sorry, hopefully you'll catch it next year.
You're welcome, have a nice day.

Okay, but what if I get a stain on it. Can i use something to spot treat?

Wet a cotton cloth and gently dab it on the area, then sprinkle some salt and let it sit for five minutes. After that, you can wash it with boiling water on the area by washer and then let it dry out.
